attributes.action: Year 10 should be given an option to take their GCSE due to coronavirus.
attributes.background: Due to the coronavirus year 10 have lost valuable learning time which could have got them a better grade for there gcse. The government should be allowed them to chose whether they want to do their gcse or have it marked the same way the year 11 have this year

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Work with regulators and exam providers to clarify exam arrangements for 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312570

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
